content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Annual General Meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held on 15 May 2017 at 13:00 CET at Bleikerveien 17, 1387 Asker, Norway.

To register for participation at the Annual General Meeting please follow this link

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_column_text]

Related documents

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Annual Report 2016″ style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-bar-chart” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F04%2FAQUALIS_Annual-Report-2016.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”AGM 2017 notice & proxy” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F04%2FAqualis-ASA-AGM-2017-notice-and-proxy-Final.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Proposal from the Nomination Committee” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2017%2F04%2FProposal-from-the-Nomination-Committee-Aqualis-ASA-AGM-15-May-2017.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
